verses.verse: Therefore, you son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Gog, <S%H1463><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I am against <S%H413><s%> you, O Gog, <S%H1463><s%> the chief <S%H7218><s%> prince <S%H5387><s%> of Meshech <S%H4902><s%> and Tubal: <S%H8422><s%>

And I will turn <S%H7725><s%> you back, <S%H7725><s%> and leave <S%H8338><s%> but the sixth <S%H8338><s%> part of you, and will cause you to come <S%H5927><s%> up from the north <S%H6828><s%> parts, <S%H3411><s%> and will bring <S%H935><s%> you on the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

And I will smite <S%H5221><s%> your bow <S%H7198><s%> out of your left <S%H8040><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and will cause your arrows <S%H2671><s%> to fall <S%H5307><s%> out of your right <S%H3225><s%> hand. <S%H3027><s%>

You shall fall <S%H5307><s%> on the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> you, and all <S%H3605><s%> your bands, <S%H102><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> that is with you: I will give <S%H5414><s%> you to the ravenous <S%H5861><s%> birds <S%H6833><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> sort, <S%H3671><s%> and to the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> to be devoured. <S%H402><s%>
You shall fall <S%H5307><s%> on the open <S%H6440><s%> field: <S%H7704><s%> for I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it, said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

And I will send <S%H7971><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> on Magog, <S%H4031><s%> and among them that dwell <S%H3427><s%> carelessly <S%H983><s%> in the isles: <S%H339><s%> and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

So will I make my holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> known <S%H3045><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and I will not let them pollute <S%H2490><s%> my holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> any more: <S%H5750><s%> and the heathen <S%H1471><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> the Holy <S%H6918><s%> One in Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> it is come, <S%H935><s%> and it is done, said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> this <S%H1931><s%> is the day <S%H3117><s%> whereof <S%H834><s%> I have spoken. <S%H1696><s%>

And they that dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall go <S%H3318><s%> forth, <S%H3318><s%> and shall set <S%H1197><s%> on fire <S%H784><s%> and burn <S%H5400><s%> the weapons, <S%H5402><s%> both the shields <S%H4043><s%> and the bucklers, <S%H6793><s%> the bows <S%H7198><s%> and the arrows, <S%H2671><s%> and the hand staves, <S%H4731><s%> <S%H3027><s%> and the spears, <S%H7420><s%> and they shall burn <S%H1197><s%> them with fire <S%H784><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years: <S%H8141><s%>

So that they shall take <S%H5375><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> out of the field, <S%H7704><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> cut <S%H2404><s%> down any out of the forests; <S%H3293><s%> for they shall burn <S%H1197><s%> the weapons <S%H5402><s%> with fire: <S%H784><s%> and they shall spoil <S%H7997><s%> those that spoiled <S%H7997><s%> them, and rob <S%H962><s%> those that robbed <S%H962><s%> them, said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass in that day, <S%H3117><s%> that I will give <S%H5414><s%> to Gog <S%H1463><s%> a place <S%H4725><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> of graves <S%H6913><s%> in Israel, <S%H3478><s%> the valley <S%H1516><s%> of the passengers <S%H5674><s%> on the east <S%H6926><s%> of the sea: <S%H3220><s%> and it shall stop <S%H2629><s%> the noses of the passengers: <S%H5674><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> shall they bury <S%H6912><s%> Gog <S%H1463><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his multitude: <S%H1995><s%> and they shall call <S%H7121><s%> it The valley <S%H1516><s%> of Hamongog. <S%H1996><s%>
And seven <S%H7651><s%> months <S%H2320><s%> shall the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> be burying <S%H6912><s%> of them, that they may cleanse <S%H2891><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>

Yes, all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> shall bury <S%H6912><s%> them; and it shall be to them a renown <S%H8034><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> that I shall be glorified, <S%H3513><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

And they shall sever <S%H914><s%> out men <S%H582><s%> of continual <S%H8548><s%> employment, passing <S%H5674><s%> through the land <S%H776><s%> to bury <S%H6912><s%> with the passengers <S%H5674><s%> those that remain <S%H3498><s%> on the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> to cleanse <S%H2891><s%> it: after the end <S%H7097><s%> of seven <S%H7651><s%> months <S%H2320><s%> shall they search. <S%H2713><s%>

And the passengers <S%H5674><s%> that pass <S%H5674><s%> through the land, <S%H776><s%> when any sees <S%H7200><s%> a man's <S%H120><s%> bone, <S%H6106><s%> then shall he set <S%H1129><s%> up a sign <S%H6725><s%> by it, till <S%H5704><s%> the buriers <S%H6912><s%> have buried <S%H6912><s%> it in the valley <S%H1516><s%> of Hamongog. <S%H1996><s%>
And also <S%H1571><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> shall be Hamonah. <S%H1997><s%> Thus shall they cleanse <S%H2891><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>

And, you son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Speak <S%H559><s%> to every <S%H3605><s%> feathered <S%H3671><s%> fowl, <S%H6833><s%> and to every <S%H3605><s%> beast <S%H2416><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> Assemble <S%H6908><s%> yourselves, and come; <S%H935><s%> gather <S%H622><s%> yourselves on every <S%H5437><s%> side <S%H5439><s%> to my sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> that I do sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> for you, even a great <S%H1419><s%> sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> on the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that you may eat <S%H398><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> blood. <S%H1818><s%>

You shall eat <S%H398><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the mighty, <S%H1368><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the princes <S%H5387><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> of rams, <S%H352><s%> of lambs, <S%H3733><s%> and of goats, <S%H6260><s%> of bullocks, <S%H6499><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them fatted calves <S%H4806><s%> of Bashan. <S%H1316><s%>

And you shall eat <S%H398><s%> fat <S%H2459><s%> till you be full, <S%H7654><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> till you be drunken, <S%H7943><s%> of my sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> for you.

Thus you shall be filled <S%H7646><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> my table <S%H7979><s%> with horses <S%H5483><s%> and chariots, <S%H7393><s%> with mighty <S%H1368><s%> men, and with all <S%H3605><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of war, <S%H4421><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

And I will set <S%H5414><s%> my glory <S%H3519><s%> among the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the heathen <S%H1471><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> my judgment <S%H4941><s%> that I have executed, <S%H6213><s%> and my hand <S%H3027><s%> that I have laid <S%H7760><s%> on them.
So the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%> from that day <S%H3117><s%> and forward. <S%H1973><s%>

And the heathen <S%H1471><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> that the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went into captivity <S%H1540><s%> for their iniquity: <S%H5771><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H834><s%> they trespassed <S%H4603><s%> against me, therefore hid <S%H5641><s%> I my face <S%H6440><s%> from them, and gave <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of their enemies: <S%H6862><s%> so fell <S%H5307><s%> they all <S%H3605><s%> by the sword. <S%H2719><s%>
According to their uncleanness <S%H2932><s%> and according to their transgressions <S%H6588><s%> have I done <S%H6213><s%> to them, and hid <S%H5641><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> from them.

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Now <S%H6258><s%> will I bring <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and have mercy <S%H7355><s%> on the whole <S%H3605><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and will be jealous <S%H7065><s%> for my holy <S%H6944><s%> name; <S%H8034><s%>

After that they have borne <S%H5375><s%> their shame, <S%H3639><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> their trespasses <S%H4604><s%> whereby <S%H834><s%> they have trespassed <S%H4603><s%> against me, when they dwelled <S%H3427><s%> safely <S%H983><s%> in their land, <S%H127><s%> and none <S%H369><s%> made them afraid. <S%H2729><s%>

When I have brought <S%H7725><s%> them again <S%H7725><s%> from the people, <S%H5971><s%> and gathered <S%H6908><s%> them out of their enemies' <S%H341><s%> lands, <S%H776><s%> and am sanctified <S%H6942><s%> in them in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> nations; <S%H1471><s%>

Then shall they know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> their God, <S%H430><s%> which caused them to be led into captivity <S%H1473><s%> among <S%H413><s%> the heathen: <S%H1471><s%> but I have gathered <S%H3664><s%> them to their own land, <S%H127><s%> and have left <S%H3498><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> of them any more <S%H5750><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> will I hide <S%H5641><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> any more <S%H5750><s%> from them: for I have poured <S%H8210><s%> out my spirit <S%H7307><s%> on the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>
